description: This is a fork of the Bembel library created by Jürgen Dölz, Helmut Harbecht, Stefan Kurz, Michael Multerer, Maximilian Nolte, Sebastian Schöps and Felix Wolf. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.3759415
